Posts.Content: hi sue i had fec through a canula for 6 lots of chemo by the end of it my veins shot so was difficult I only have the use of one arm as have lymphodema on my right arm. the following year had to have another 6 so had a picc line this was easier for me but you do have to have it checked  but cant remmeber how frequently This was done by my district nurse in the home There can be complications so you need to be aware of what this can be I had no complications but everyone is different.  Having the picc line put in was also no problem but again you need to be aware of complications  Hope this helps lady
Posts.Title: PICC lines for chemo
